name: Police Chase Race - Smash and Crush Crimals
name_original: Police Chase Race - Smash and Crush Crimals
description:
Police Pursuit Chase is a real racing 3D game allows you to experience the most epic chase on the road. You are the sheriff of a small town. Your city is in need of a police cop hero who can chase down even the most wanted thugs and help eliminate crimes.

Unlock new tracks and cars by catching criminals while in a hot pursuit police chase. Make your way to chasing the enemies by locating on city map. Beware! It’s a public place, criminals will be driving through the city, shopping malls, schoolyard, hospitals, public parking, so make sure you don’t hit any innocent.

Police Chase is an exciting racing and simulation game that will test yours’ driving SKILLS that are most essential to be a super cop. So get out there and protect your city. You must have played many racing games but the excitement of this free racing game is that you get a chance of testing your driving and shooting skills all together.

Game Features:

- Realistic urban city environment
- Chase criminal cars and busted them
- Realistic Car Physics
- Challenging Missions
- 4 powerful police cars to unlock
- Smooth and 3 types of controls
- Upgrade your car to hunt down the most wanted criminals
